page.title: 18LIFE STYLES
page.content: LIFE STYLES, POLITICS & COUNTRY LIFE. The first things a small child recognises outside the home are the animals and farm machinery, tractors etc. In the towns there are youth clubs and coffee houses in the country there is the Young Farmer's, this is open to anyone under 26 years of age. Apart from farming husbandry & skills the Young Farmer's has a social side with outings, dances, & exchanges between areas & countrys. Comps., & representation at the Agricultural Shows. For the farming adults there is the National Farmer's Union. It helps in a practical way by explaining the changes in rules & regulations (taxes & Common Market,etc.) This is considered a safe Conservative seat,perhaps because the Conservative candidate is generally connected in some way with farming.
